abstract: St Louis Cardinals manager Tony La Russa used four relievers in Game 5 of the World Series against Texas Rangers to establish a postseason record of 65, but his maneuvers failed to prevent a loss.
snippet: St. Louis Cardinals Manager Tony La Russa used four relievers in Game 5 of the World Series to establish a postseason record of 65, but his maneuvers failed to prevent a loss.
lead_paragraph: St. Louis Cardinals Manager Tony La Russa used four relievers in Game 5 of the World Series to establish a postseason record of 65, but his maneuvers failed to prevent a loss.

headline.main: La Russa Was Due to Dial Wrong Bullpen Numbers
headline.print_headline: La Russa Was Due to Dial Wrong Bullpen Numbers
headline.seo: Tony La Russa’s Bullpen Moves Leave Him Open for Criticism
